comment.body: yes, its “saint Stefan’s” day so pubs will be open and lots of drinking involved
But the Christmas market will be closed and during the day most people will be visiting their families... it will be more lively in the afternoon.
Stores will be closed, but most Malina supermarkets will be open - [Prevádzky - Potraviny Malina](https://www.malina.sk/).
Thank you! This is good to hear!
Ah! As long as everything isn't completely closed, it should be fun to visit! Thank you!
